meanings.definition: The quality or state of being excellent or valuable.
meanings.sent1: Her sterlingness as a friend shines through in times of need.
meanings.sent2: The sterlingness of the diamond made it a prized possession.
meanings.sent3: His sterlingness in video games is unmatched, he always wins!
meanings.sent4: The sterlingness of her voice was like a melody that captivated all who listened.
meanings.sent5: The sterlingness of the sunset painted the sky in hues of gold and pink.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being genuine or authentic.
meanings.sent1: The sterlingness of his smile made everyone trust him instantly.
meanings.sent2: The antique dealer could spot the sterlingness of a piece from a mile away.
meanings.sent3: The sterlingness of her excuse for being late was that she got lost in her own neighborhood!
meanings.sent4: His sterlingness in telling jokes made him the life of the party.
meanings.sent5: The sterlingness of the old book was evident in its well-preserved pages.
